definition: a poker hand with 2 cards of the same value, bring two objects, ideas, or people together
details:
noun
- a poker hand with 2 cards of the same value
- two people considered as a unit
- a set of two similar things considered as a unit
= synonyms: brace
- two items of the same kind
= synonyms: span
verb
- bring two objects, ideas, or people together
= synonyms: mate
- engage in sexual intercourse
= synonyms: mate
- arrange in pairs
= synonyms: geminate
- occur in pairs
= synonyms: geminate
- form a pair or pairs
= example: form a pair or pairs
= synonyms: couple
